# 牛客网互联网校招大礼包 2021

## 下载

### Docker

```
docker pull apachecn0/niuke-wang-hulianwang-xiaozhao-dalibao-2021
docker run -tid -p <port>:80 apachecn0/niuke-wang-hulianwang-xiaozhao-dalibao-2021
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### PYPI

```
pip install niuke-wang-hulianwang-xiaozhao-dalibao-2021
niuke-wang-hulianwang-xiaozhao-dalibao-2021 <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```

### NPM

```
npm install -g niuke-wang-hulianwang-xiaozhao-dalibao-erlingeryi
niuke-wang-hulianwang-xiaozhao-dalibao-erlingeryi <port>
# 访问 http://localhost:{port} 查看文档
```
